abilities.name: dry-skin
abilities.effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: solar-power
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
